artifacts.summary: Recursive seed construction infrastructure with proven helper lemmas
Seed completion to MCS with proven seedFamilyMCS lemmas
BMCS construction with proven nonempty and eval_family_mem
Updated plan with Phase 3/4/5 progress details

partial_progress.details: Session 3 completed. Reduced sorries from 15 to 12. Main progress: Added helper lemmas (hasPosition_iff_findEntry_isSome, addFormula_preserves_consistent, buildSeed_has_family_zero). Fixed seedFamilyMCS_is_mcs, seedFamilyMCS_contains_seed, buildSeedBMCS nonempty proofs. Remaining blockers: seedConsistent (requires induction proof), buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices (library compatibility), buildFamilyFromSeed (complex construction).

completion_data.completion_summary: Session 3 progress on recursive seed Henkin model: added 6 new helper lemmas, proved 4 sorries (seedFamilyMCS_is_mcs, seedFamilyMCS_contains_seed, buildSeedBMCS.nonempty, buildSeedBMCS.eval_family_mem). Reduced sorry count from 15 to 12. Key blockers remain: seedConsistent theorem requires full induction proof, buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices has Mathlib4 library compatibility issues.
